## Summary



## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Chore / Refactor

## Checklist

- [ ] I have run `npm run check` locally and fixed TypeScript issues
- [ ] I have run `npm run build` and it completes successfully
- [ ] Added/updated tests where relevant
- [ ] Added/updated documentation if needed

## How to test

1. Steps to reproduce locally
2. Commands to run

## Notes
Any additional notes for the reviewer.
